itunes:title: April Books on the Radar + Ways to Squeeze in More Time for Reading
title: April Books on the Radar + Ways to Squeeze in More Time for Reading
description:
In Episode 44 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share a few of their most anticipated April Releases. They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about ways to squeeze in more time for reading.Â 

**If you enjoy our podcast, please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We'd love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, Even More Best of the Year, Backlist Book Club, Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, Mood Reader Happy Hour, an engaging private Facebook group & our BRAND NEW DISCORD where you can interact with other listeners, and more- all for just $5 a month!

*The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!

Loving Lately
2:33 The Diamond Eye | Kate Quinn
3:38 Books With Lee on Tik Tok (T)
7:35 Clarins One Step Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser w/Orange Extract (R)
9:26 I'll Be You | Janelle Brown (T)
13:41 Lies She Told | Cate Holahan (R) ðŸŽ§

18:55 Book Talk
20:17 Reading Hacks Article
34:30 Memphis | Tara Stringfellow
34:38 Sea of Tranquility |Emily St. John Mandel
34:49 Funny You Should Ask | Elissa Sussman
34:57 Like a House on Fire | Lauren McBrayer
35:08 The Fervor | Alma Katzu
35:26 Unlikely Animals | Annie Hartnett (R)
37:38 Goodbye Vitamin | Rachel Khong
38:39 Benefit | Siobhan Phillips (T)
40:34 The Tobacco Wives | Adele Myers
40:50 Free | Lauren Kessler (R)
44:13 The Sun Does Shine | Anthony Ray Hinton
44:24 The Good Son | Jaqueline Mitchard
44:44 In the Face of the Sun | Denny S. Bryce (T)
46:39 When We Fell Apart | Soon Wiley (R)
50:01 Such Big Dreams | Reema PatelÂ  (T)
52:27 The Children on the Hill | Jennifer McMahon (R)
55:37 Winter People & Burntown | Jennifer McMahon
56:07 The Wild Girls | Phoebe Morgan (T)

Check out Chapters for images!

Connect with us on social media! On Instagram, Tina @Tbretc, Renee

Support the show

Thanks so much for listening!ðŸŽ§

Email us at booktalketc@gmail
